Row.Text: The desire to travel is flourishing in {3_MinorCivName:textkey}, and they seek tourism guidance. Whoever can produce the most [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism in a period of {2_TurnsDuration} turns will gain [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with them. [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_TurnsRemaining} turns remaining.[ENDCOLOR]

You have impressed {1_MinorCivName:textkey} with your tourism! They turn a blind eye to the tourism of other civilizations, and your [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence over them has increased by [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{2_InfluenceReward}[ENDCOLOR]. Civilizations that succeeded (ties are allowed):[NEWLINE]

Another civilization has impressed {1_MinorCivName:textkey} with its tourism. Your tourism growth was not enough, and your [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence remains the same as before. Civilizations that succeeded (ties are allowed):[NEWLINE]
They will reward the player with the largest Tourism growth.
{TXT_KEY_MINOR_CIV_QUEST_TOURISM_CONTEST_FORMAL} So far, you have the lead with [ICON_TOURISM][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_PlayerScore}[ENDCOLOR].
{TXT_KEY_MINOR_CIV_QUEST_TOURISM_CONTEST_FORMAL} So far, the leader has [ICON_TOURISM]{1_LeaderScore} and you have [ICON_TOURISM][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{2_PlayerScore}[ENDCOLOR].

Der Wunsch zu Reisen erblüht in {3_MinorCivName:textkey}, und sie suchen nach Unterweisung in Tourismus. Wer auch immer den meisten [ICON_TOURISM] Tourismus in einer Zeitspanne von {2_TurnsDuration} Runden generiert, erhält [ICON_INFLUENCE] Einfluss bei ihnen. [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Noch {1_TurnsRemaining} Runden.[ENDCOLOR]

Ihr habt {1_MinorCivName:textkey} mit Eurem Tourismus beeindruckt! Euer [ICON_INFLUENCE] Einfluss bei ihnen ist gestiegen um [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{2_InfluenceReward}[ENDCOLOR]. Erfolgreiche Zivilisationen (Bündnisse erlaubt):[NEWLINE]

Eine andere Zivilisation hat {1_MinorCivName:textkey} mit ihrem Tourismus beeindruckt. Euer Tourismus Wachstum war nicht genug, und Euer [ICON_INFLUENCE] Einfluss bleibt unverändert. Erfolgreiche Zivilisationen (Bündnisse erlaubt):[NEWLINE]
Sie werden den Spieler mit dem größten Tourismus Wachstum belohnen.
{TXT_KEY_MINOR_CIV_QUEST_TOURISM_CONTEST_FORMAL} Bisher hat der Führende [ICON_TOURISM]{1_LeaderScore} und Ihr habt [ICON_TOURISM][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{2_PlayerScore}[ENDCOLOR].
